title: SANJI DESTROYS SATORI!! One Piece Episode 163, 164 & 165 REACTION + REVIEW
author: Unknown Reactor
description: A reaction and review video covering episodes 163-165, including the major revelation about Upper Yard being part of Jaya.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains discussion of events through episode 165

title: THE BIG REVEAL, UPPER YARD ISLAND! | ONE PIECE Episode 164 Couples Reaction & Discussion
author: Unknown Reactor
description: A couples reaction video focusing on the major revelation in Episode 164 that Upper Yard was once part of Jaya.

title: One Piece Episode 163-164 Reaction/Review
author: SprinkleVerse
description: Patreon-exclusive reaction and review content covering episodes 163 and 164 of One Piece.

title: Sam's Piece: Skypiea Is the Best 'One Piece' Arc and There's Nothing You Can Do About It
author: Sam Leach
description: An editorial piece defending the Skypiea Arc as the best arc in One Piece, discussing its themes, world-building, and importance to the overall story.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire Skypiea Arc

title: One Piece: The Tragic History of Skypiea
author: GameRant
description: An article exploring the tragic 400-year history of Skypiea, including the story of Noland and Kalgara, the Knock Up Stream event, and the ongoing conflict over Upper Yard.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers about Skypiea's backstory and the resolution of the arc

title: One Piece Diaries #22: 'Skypiea Arc' #2
author: ComicCon
description: A diary-style review covering episodes 164-174 of the Skypiea Arc, documenting a first-time watcher's experience with this portion of the story.

title: OPReadthrough #6, 'Skypiea' (Part Two)
author: The One Piece Podcast
description: Part two of The One Piece Podcast's comprehensive readthrough of the Skypiea arc, covering the final movement including the revelation about Upper Yard and Jaya.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire second half of Skypiea arc
